mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members(mem_id, mem_pw, mem_nm, mem_nickname, mem_gender, mem_birth, profile_img) VALUES(#{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memNm}, #{memNickname}, #{memGender}, #{memBirth}, #{profileImg})
mapper.select: SELECT mem_id , mem_pw , mem_nm , mem_nickname , mem_gender , mem_birth , profile_img FROM members WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND mem_id = #{memId} AND mem_pw = #{memPw}
